message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.NE 

This paper is about using event-based optical flow for landing control of a flying robot. The paper discusses the integration of event-based optical flow estimation into the control loop of a quadrotor, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The paper also presents an improved and more computationally efficient optical flow estimation method, which involves computer vision techniques (cs.CV) and machine learning algorithms (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the validation of the developed algorithms for real event sequences, which involves system identification and control theory (cs.SY). Finally, the paper presents a method for estimating the divergence from event-based optical flow, which involves neural networks and signal processing (cs.NE).
